title: new champ 2 swords
body:
PASSIVE=AUTO ATTACKS HIT 2 TIMES- however cannot criticly strike-does apply on hit effects
physical damage increases attack speed

Q=rend, next 2 auto attacks deal bonus physical damage applying onhit effects and slow the target
w=dash and gash- dashes to a target location, 2 charges
e=windmill- spins both swords deflecting an auto attack or spell, successful parrys will automaticly hit the target with rend.
r=superspeed reset- passive attack speed also increases movment speed- activation of this ability will reset a cooldown and buff it according to your choice.
q  next 2 auto attacks deal extra bonus physical damage applying on hit effects and stunning the target
w dash has 3 charges instantly flashes larger distants and bonus movespeed after
e winmill will deflect 2 autos or spells and applying rend both times, normal rend

replies.body: the passive is broken, it's a 100% crit chance at all times that isn't reduced by masteries that reduce crit chance damage
First sentence states cannot critically strike....

You autoattack twice always.

Have 68 AD? You deal 136 damage.

What if Caitlyin had 68 AD and 100% crit? She would also deal 136 damage. Only difference is that she has to invest in crit chance.

Cait attacks somebody with the 10% crit damage reduction mastery? Crits deal 190% damage. Meanwhile your autoattacks wouldn't be because they aren't classified as crits.

This is basically a rip off of different champs abilities with them being combined and reskinned to have 2 swords. Concept could be cool looking but new champs need to be that NEW, not let's take this ability and this one.


Here are the skill comparisons:

Passive: Nocturne- not every hit however the concept is very similair

Q: Rend- Kalista, needs to be renamed, Next attack deals bonus damage= Gragas, Riven, Lux, Leona...you get the idea. Very overplayed and lacking creativity (bad when there is 130ish champs out)

W- Renektons Slice and Dice, honestly sounds like the exact same skill.

E- Garen, stop remaking Garen for the love of god.

R- Useless, it is like Zilean's W but with a higher level to learn it and less benefits.


Overall I would HIGHLY suggest redoing, nothing seems unique about the champ, nothing seems bad ass or overly impressive, it is just a "Here have another champ with renamed (in some cases) abilities and a new look...."
